import React from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import products from "../Products"; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const ProductScreen = () => { const { id: productId } = useParams(); const product = products.find((product) => product._id === productId); return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 price: {product.price} description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? "In Stock" : "Out of Stock"} ); }; export default ProductScreen;
